thread.section_title: TicketCity Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketCity | www.ticketcity.com | 6 of 289
thread.title: Sadee

author: Sadee
title: Sadee
text: I would definitely recommend TicketCity to anyone. I have a post office box only so we always have issues with shipping packages to us. I had someone from TicketCity, an actual person email me and ask me for a new location to send it to because they cannot deliver to a PO Box. I then continued to ask her about the delivery time etc and she responded within minutes. They seem to have GREAT customer service. It is so nice in a time when computer responses are so common to hear from a person. I received my tickets within 3 days even though when I ordered it said it could take up to 2 weeks.
